author: samajammin
content:
Someone asked this in our (ethereum.org) Discord server:

> I think Eth foundation discord group should have a separate section chat for economic policy chat too or can we discuss that over here?

author: samajammin
content: Is there a relevant channel in this server to send folks interesting in discussion Ethereum economics?

author: samajammin
content: Or where would you recommend referring these folks?

author: samajammin
content: Best place I can think of is here: https://ethresear.ch/c/economics/16

author: timbeiko
content: That's what I would suggest too
